definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: prob. something netted, i.e. either a quilt or (Ew:H. 8. 77 Ke) a

definitions.title: fly-net
definitions.body: (kwnwpei=on) spread over the face while a person was asleep; 1Sa 19:13, 1Sa 19:16 [[כְּבִיר הָעִזִּים]] a quilt (or fly-net) of goats (’ hair). Vid. further Dr:ad loc.
